frontmatter.description: Professional Resume using Google's Material Design visual language. Built using modern web development workflow tools, such as Bower for package mamagement, Gulp and plugins for web development task management, Jade as HTML template language and Materialize SASS as CSS scaffolding.

sides.label: Summary
items: Extensive software development experience and currently working at LEAP Legal Software Australia since 2016. Involved in numerous software development projects such as Australian wide's Documents & Precedents Automation, LEAP-Plugins development and Internal software development

More than five years of software development experience since 2013. Familiar with several programming languages such as C#, JavaScripts, SQL, Java, and Python as well as many frameworks such as Angular, MVC and Entity Framework
Experience and involved with the whole development cycle from design to deployment. Passion in learning new technologies and keen to put them in production and solve the real world problems
Familiar with the Git and version control. Always looking for and adopting best practices when programming
Outside of the work, I'm interested in learning new technologies and involve in non-work related projects to try out.

items.label: Python / Flask / Numpy / Pandas / matplotlib / scikit-learn / tensorflow
LEAP Legal Software, Australia
items.role: Software developer (2019 March LEAPStar - Monthly reward for best employee)

projects.name: Bookmarks Classification system
descriptions: Lead and responsible for designing and developing a web app that is capable of using ML-based classifier to assist thousands of bookmarks classification each week

Boost the productivity of bookmark classification by using NLP technologies and ML-based classifier (SVM) to assist the classification thus the only smaller portion of bookmarks that requires human to go through
Using various front and back end technologies such as Angular 6 with Redux, Asp.Net Core2 API, and PostgreSQL to construct the app.

projects.name: LEAP Matter Information Central
descriptions: Lead and responsible for designing and developing a web app that serves as a tool for LEAP's Matter Management. Thus provide the analytical overview of Matters and other insightful information
To present the analytical information to the user through various data-visualization technologies and hence hope to become the go-to tool for the user to manage their matter created in the system
Using various front and back end technologies such as Angular 7 with Redux, Asp.Net Core2 for API, and DynamoDB to construct the app.

projects.name: Document Automation System Development and Innovation
descriptions: Lead and responsible for designing and developing the LEAP's PDF Document Automation System. This system allows the LEAP to introduces new products in addition to Word Document Automation. Thus, thousands of PDF precedents and documents are capable of being automated by LEAP now
Optimize the code and design of the system. As the result, PDF automation system performs 10 times better than the Word Document Automation System

Before I took it over, this project had started one year but not able to progress due to technology bottleneck. I spend about three months to make a breakthrough on the bottleneck, and now the system had gone online in production.

projects.name: LEAP Document Automation core calculations and engine development
descriptions: Responsible to develop core Document Automation system that using vanilla JS. Responsible for over thousands of core calculations development

This engine and calculations are the heart of the LEAP's document automation system. It is responsible for clients daily document creations and updates. The new engine went online smoothly without interruption

projects.name: Other project
descriptions: As the front end developer, using Node and Angular4 and other Web technology to convert the VBA based document automation plugin to JavaScripts based document plugin. New JavaScripts based document plugin boost the user experience and system performance
As the full stack developer design and develop various plugins according to requirements.

projects.name: Animal Offender Identification App
descriptions: As the member of E-Research in The University of Melbourne, I was responsible for designing and developing an Android App and a Spring-based JAVA back end to identify the offender in the field of animal protection
Leverage the mobility that Mobile App offers this project power it with Voice and Image recognition technology to help patrols to identify the Offenders
This project also formed as part of my Master thesis and achieved H1 in the end.

projects.name: SAAS HR System
descriptions: Responsible for using Asp.Net C#, AngularJs, SQL Server to develop various modulesï¼ŒFamiliar with various Web Frameworks such as Angular and MVC
Using various testing techniques such as Selenium, VS-UnitTest to perform the app testing
Full stack developer in responding to the front, back, and database end development

projects.name: Assistance in Account Receivable, Payable and Bank Reconciliation
descriptions: Responsible for assisting daily accounting tasks which involved tasks in Account Receivable, Account Payable, and Bank Reconciliation.

projects.name: Office Admin
descriptions: Responsible for assisting daily office admin task

projects.name: Sale Assistance
descriptions: Responsible for assisting daily real estate consultation

items.label: The University of Melbourne
descriptions: Part-time student to finish my study in Computer Science at The University of Melbourne, granted with Scholarship from the Department of Engineering. All the research projects had achieved the highest grade of H1, published paper A Mobile Application and Cloud Platform Supporting Research into Alcohol Consumption on ICMHI2017

Main research focus in applied computing and concentrate of using Cloud, mobile and AI technology in various fields and thus capable of changing the way people doing things and allow them to be benefited by the leading computing technologies
Invited by the supervisor to join the E-Research group in The University of Melbourne, focus on apply computing
Study various non-research subjects mainly focus on AI, Machine Learning and Distributed Systems.

items.label: RMIT
descriptions: Study in Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology and achieved GPA of 3.9/4.0 ,top 10% in the deparment, invited to become a Golden Key member

items.label: The University of Melbourne
descriptions: Graduated from the Bachelor of Commerce major in Accounting and Finance
